text: The 1923–24 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Art, Science and Industry during the 1923–24 men's basketball season. The Blue and Gold, led by 2nd year head coach Harvey O'Brien, played their home games at Main Building. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Category:1923 in sports in Pennsylvania Category:1924 in sports in Pennsylvania
title: 1923–24 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team
